books.author: by Rachel Van Dyken
books.description: Jake, a Seattle millionaire, asks his formerly estranged childhood friend Kacey to pretend to be engaged to him. But she reckoned without Jake’s brother, Travis.
books.name: THE BET

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: Two sisters are threatened by a dark secret from their family’s past.
books.name: DADDY'S GONE A HUNTING

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The New York lawyer Stone Barrington discovers a shadowy network beneath the world of European wealth.
books.name: UNINTENDED CONSEQUENCES

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Six years after the woman he loved married another man, Jake Fisher discovers that neither she nor their life together were what theyseemed, and he sets out to uncover the truth.
books.name: SIX YEARS

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: An Army doctor returns from Afghanistan when his wife dies in what at first appears to be an accident, and finds that his life is falling apart.
books.name: DON'T GO

books.author: by H. M. Ward
books.description: young woman goes to bed with a sexy man, but complications ensue. The first in a series.
books.name: DAMAGED

books.author: by Kate Atkinson
books.description: A woman appears in different versions of the same events, centered on World War II.
books.name: LIFE AFTER LIFE

books.author: by Robert Jordan and Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The 14th and final novel in the Wheel of Time fantasy series.
books.name: A MEMORY OF LIGHT

books.author: by Jasinda Wilder
books.description: Years after her boyfriend’s accidental death, Nell Hawthorne encounters his older brother, and they embark on a painful but ultimately healing relationship.
books.name: FALLING INTO YOU

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: A New Hampshire baker finds herself in the midst of two Holocaust stories: her grandmother’s story of survival, and the confessions of an elderly German man, an SS officer.
books.name: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Jace, Ash and Gabe are powerful and used to getting anything they want. But Jace’s friendship with Ash is jeopardized when he becomes obsessed with an alluring woman; Book 2 of the Breathless trilogy.
books.name: FEVER

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: While Alex Cross pursues a Washington serial killer (or killers?), someone is after him.
books.name: ALEX CROSS, RUN

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: Hank Cooper inherits a beachfront property in Thunder Point, Ore., and finds himself with a community’s destiny in his hands.
books.name: THE WANDERER

books.author: by Jamie McGuire
books.description: Travis’s life is full of fast women, underground gambling and violence. But just when he thinks he’s invincible, Abby brings him to his knees; a sequel to “Beautiful Disaster.”
books.name: WALKING DISASTER
